items.text_for_match: Pundits have 'duty of responsibility' - Van Dijk Former players turned pundits have a "duty of responsibility" to the new generation of footballers when commenting on their performances, Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk says. Former players turned pundits have a "duty of responsibility" to the new generation of footballers when commenting on their performances, Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk says.

items.en: Liverpool to pay Chelsea at least £2.8m for Ngumoha
items.text_for_match: Liverpool to pay Chelsea at least £2.8m for Ngumoha A tribunal rules Liverpool must pay Chelsea an intial £2.8m for signing teenage winger Rio Ngumoha from the Blues' academy in 2024. items.ja: Man Utd prepare to honour Munich disaster victims
items.en: Man Utd prepare to honour Munich disaster victims
items.text_for_match: Man Utd prepare to honour Munich disaster victims It is impossible to fully understand the magnitude of the  crash that killed 23 people, eight of them Manchester United players, until you work for the club, says women's coach Marc Skinner. items.ja: Why are Real Madrid players training in masks?
items.en: Why are Real Madrid players training in masks?
items.text_for_match: Why are Real Madrid players training in masks? Real Madrid players have been pictured taking part in high-intensity drills while wearing unusual blue masks - so what's the reason for them?
